tool_description: MovieHut is a random movie suggestion API with  multiple endpoints and features.
name: MovieHut -  Random Movie
title: MovieHut -  Random Movie

api_list.name: Get List of Movies Sorted by IMDb Rating (With Parameters)
api_list.description: Gets the list of movies sorted by their IMDb Rating. Query parameters like limiting, pagination and selection can be added.

api_list.name: Get Movie Details by Name
api_list.description: Returns name, releaseYear, certificate, certificate, genre, imdbRating, overview, metaScore, and director parameters for a movie of your choice.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://moviehut-random-movie.p.rapidapi.com/api/movie/fight%20club"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moviehut-random-movie.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://moviehut-random-movie.p.rapidapi.com/api/movie/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moviehut-random-movie.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Random Movie
api_list.description: The endpoint will return a random movie with all the details such as name, releaseYear, certificate, certificate, genre, imdbRating, overview, metaScore, and director.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://moviehut-random-movie.p.rapidapi.com/api/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moviehut-random-movie.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
